sentences.en: But the clever salesclerk soon realized which item I wanted.
sentences.cn: 但那聪明的店员马上明?我想要的东西.

sentences.en: Eve is a supervisor at a department store. George a new salesclerk.
sentences.cn: 伊芙是一家百货公司的主管, 乔治是菜鸟店员.

sentences.en: He is certainly a good salesclerk.
sentences.cn: 他确实是个能干的店员.

sentences.en: I am now working here a salesclerk.
sentences.cn: 临时到这里来当一回店员.

sentences.en: I don't know. We can find out by asking a salesclerk.
sentences.cn: 我不知道, 我们可以请店员帮忙找找看.

sentences.en: Salesclerk: Come along then and bring this receipt with you.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 那到时候来吧,把这张发票带上.

sentences.en: Salesclerk: Sorry, lady. We can't do that.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 对不起, 小姐. 我们不能那么做.
店员: 那听起来很好 啊 !

sentences.en: Salesclerk: We never overcharge. It is a fair price to pay.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 我们从来不乱出价. 这是公道价钱.

sentences.en: Salesclerk: Which color would you like?
sentences.cn: 售货员: 您喜欢哪种颜色?

sentences.en: SALESCLERK? Do you want large fries or small fries?

sentences.en: SALESCLERK? Do you want large, small or medium Coke?

sentences.en: The salesclerk has sold a lot of cars.
sentences.cn: 这名店员卖掉了很多辆汽车.
